main event: A witness observed a small, dull reddish-white object or glow in Newark, Ohio, which appeared to grow brighter and larger, resembling a bright star.
interesting points: The object was observed for approximately 15-20 seconds by the witness and another person., The object was moving east to west and was initially mistaken for a reflecting object., At maximum intensity, the object seemed to be flashing bright white and moving at varying speeds., The witness noted that the object was approximately the size of an automobile and around 900 feet in altitude., The sighting occurred at 2045 EST under clear skies with visible stars.
sighted object: small, dull reddish-white object or glow
witness description: The witness described the object as round, silver in color, and larger than a car.
